reviews.text: Great location and close to two Metro stations. Georgeous view from hotel room. Courteous hotel staff. Big rooms with comfy beds. We booked on Priceline who carries good discounts to this hotel.

We stayed for 3 nights in this hotel (Nov.1- 4, 2004). We paid $130 per night. We were given a lovely room overlooking the Seine river on the 29th floor after informing the staff that we don't want to stay on the 31st floor. The room was very clean,modern and good size (bigger than your average parisian hotel room). The staff were very helpful and speaks english. The only let down was the iron & board which you have to hire. Eiffel tower was only 15 minutes walk from the hotel and there's a supermarket & few brasseries closeby.The concierge named Domonique recommended to us an elegant & historic french restaurant called La Procope founded in 1686 & where Chopin, Bonaparte etc.. dined! The food was wonderful & the place is surrounded by historical facts & items!
reviews.title: A definite 4 star hotel - clean & modern hotel and good customer service

reviews.text: This hotel is in sort of an ugly neighborhood in a 1970's building. In addition, the room that was provided to us was substandard. I booked this through priceline and it seems as if they maintain a different and worse inventory of rooms for pricline customers. The room smelled and the carpet had nasty stains on it. In addition, the bathroom was some odd japanese deal from the early 1970's This hotel used to be the NIkko Hotel in Paris. The Novotel has not redone some of its rooms. Be very cautious when booking this hotel. Make sure they give you a better room than the one that was given to me.
reviews.title: Not a Nice Hotel

description: The Novotel Paris Tour Eiffel is a 4 star hotel with 764 rooms overlooking the Seine, moments away from the Eiffel Tower. An ideal venue for seminars, conferences and conventions offering 2,200 sqm of modular rooms. Guests on a business trip to Paris can unwind in our Blue Fitness Eiffel fitness centre with pool and sauna (fees apply). Enjoy the choice of the Benkay Japanese restaurant (washoku, teppanyaki, sushi bar), the Tour Eiffel Cafe and La Seine lounge bar.
